name: Planes, Bullets and Vodka
description:
Planes, Bullets and Vodka, is a retro infinite shmup with randomly generated elements. Grab your manche with your right hand, your vodka with your left hand and kill everything in front of you!FEATURES
  • Retro visual
  • Great to play both with controller and keyboard;
  • Leaderboards;
  • 8 Types of enemies;
  • Power-Ups;
  • Randomly generated paths;
  • 10 Awesome Tracks
  • Free MP3 Soundtrack
  • Trading cards
  • Achievements
